{{Description|Hu Tao's Secret Spear technique is based on several rules, the first of which is: "The spear opens the path to the afterlife, and the butterflies bridge this world and the next."}}
'''Guide to Afterlife''' is [[Hu Tao]]'s [[Elemental Skill]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{TalentNote|particles|a converted attack|2.5}}
** This particle generation has a cooldown of ~5 seconds.
** Therefore, it can generate a total of '''4-6''' [[Elemental Particle]]s through its whole duration.
* While Paramita Papilio State is active, Hu Tao doesn't step back before charging forward. This makes her Charged Attacks under this state faster than normal.
* This skill's activation produces a damageless [[0U]] {{Pyro}} attack around Hu Tao.
* No HP will be consumed if Hu Tao has exactly 1 HP left when activating the skill.

;<big>Passive Effects</big>
